name: Kobold Weapon Innovator
summary: You've learned devious tactics with your kobold weapons.
description:
You've learned devious tactics with your kobold weapons. Whenever you critically hit with a crossbow, greatpick, light pick, pick, spear, or kobold weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.Traits

Kobold: A creature with this trait is a member of the kobold ancestry. Kobolds are reptilian humanoids who are usually Small and typically have darkvision. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by kobolds.
